name: Space Dog - Pet Sim in Space
name_original: Space Dog - Pet Sim in Space
description:
A real-time pet simulator/space journey. Space dog is  the story of a brave little pup who's going to the moon. Take care of him on his journey into the dark unknown. 

Made for the Virtual Pet Jam. It's a rushed prototype, so please let me know if you have any comments (or bugs!)  Also theres no sound, but will hopefully add later.

=====FAQ =====

  • Is there sound? Ran out of time to implement sound for the jam, but will do soon!
  • Do I have to keep the app open?  The game should save when you quit, make sure to check back often! 
  • Help! My dog died. What do I do?  An option will unlock to start over.
  • My dog's happiness is not going past 3 hearts.  Make sure you clean the poo first before playtime.
  • How far is it to the moon? very far
  • How long does it take to get to the moon? shorter than I expected
  • Why did you make this? A true story. Rest in peace brave pup
